content: अपविद्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Cast or thrown off, thrown or cast away, abandoned, forsaken, dismissed, rejected, neglected, removed; <ab>oft.</ab> used in the sense of ‘freed from,’ ‘devoid of’; रक्षोविप्रकृतावास्तामपविद्धशुचाविव <ls>R. 10. 74.</ls> {@--2@} Abject, mean. --द्धः, °पुत्रः A son that is abandoned by the father or mother or by both, and adopted by a stranger; one of the 12 kinds of sons among Hindus; <ls>Ms. 9. 171</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 132.</ls>
